entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High plus 4.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with snow changing to light snow near midnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 30%
